meanings.definition: A type of plant with glossy green leaves and colorful flowers.
meanings.sent1: I planted some vincas in my garden for their beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The vincas in the park brightened up the whole area with their colorful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The vincas in the garden seemed to be showing off their vibrant colors to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The vincas stood out like little pieces of art among the greenery of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hues of the vincas made them the stars of the garden.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'vinca'.
meanings.sent1: I have several vincas in my backyard, each with its own unique charm.
meanings.sent2: The vincas in the flower shop come in various colors and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The vincas on the shelf looked like a colorful army ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: The vincas in the garden seemed to multiply overnight, creating a sea of colors.
meanings.sent5: The vincas lined up in rows, creating a beautiful display of diversity.
